definition: to protect/to defend/to guard against/to prevent
item/component/classifier for events, things, clothes etc

sentences.english: Just like Antivirus software, it needs to be updated all the time.
sentences.chinese: 就像防毒軟件，它需要更新全部時間。

sentences.english: I asked Tim to install an antivirus software program on my computer.
sentences.chinese: 我要求提姆幫我計算機安裝一套防毒軟件。

sentences.english: By now, you know to have antivirus software installed on your PC.
sentences.chinese: 現在，你知道你有安裝防毒軟件PC機。

sentences.english: A very good free Anti-Virus Software.
Do you have virus protection software on your PC?
sentences.chinese: 你的電腦有防毒軟件嗎？

sentences.english: Targeted attacks and Advanced Persistent Threats cannot be stopped by antivirus alone.
sentences.chinese: 單憑防毒軟件無法阻止目標性攻擊和高級持續性威脅。

sentences.english: Virus protection software usually makes that more of a hassle.
sentences.chinese: 防毒軟件往往只會增加麻煩。
